summary: American honeymooners in Hungary become trapped in the home of a Satan-worshiping priest when the bride is taken there for medical help following a road accident.
cast: Boris Karloff|Bela Lugosi|David Manners|Julie Bishop|Egon Brecher|Harry Cording|Lucille Lund|Henry Armetta|Albert Conti|Virginia Ainsworth|Luis Alberni|King Baggot|Herman Bing|Symona Boniface|John Carradine|André Cheron|Anna Duncan|John George|Rodney Hildebrand|Lois January|Michael Mark|Tony Marlow|Alphonse Martell|Paul Panzer|Albert Pollet|Peggy Terry|Harry Walker|Paul Weigel
title: Satanás
